mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT recruit_no, recruit_name,recruit_title,recruit_career,recruit_educareer, recruit_certificate, recruit_major, recruit_type, recruit_sal, recruit_position, recruit_content, member_no FROM Recruit ORDER BY recruit_no DESC ) B ORDER BY rnum ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo} and #{endNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recruit( recruit_no, recruit_name, recruit_title, recruit_career, recruit_educareer, recruit_certificate, recruit_major, recruit_type, recruit_sal, recruit_position, recruit_content, member_no ) VALUES (recruit_seq.nextval, #{recruit_name}, #{recruit_title}, #{recruit_career}, #{recruit_educareer}, #{recruit_certificate}, #{recruit_major}, #{recruit_type}, #{recruit_sal}, #{recruit_position}, #{recruit_content}, #{member_no} )
INSERT INTO recruit_file (recruit_file_no, recruit_file_storedname, recruit_file_originname) VALUES (recruit_file_seq.nextval, #{recruit_file_storedname}, #{recruit_file_originname})
mapper.update: UPDATE recruit SET recruit_name = #{recruit_name}, recruit_title = #{recruit_title}, recruit_career = #{recruit_career}, recruit_educareer = #{recruit_educareer}, recruit_certificate = #{recruit_certificate}, recruit_major = #{recruit_major}, recruit_type = #{recruit_type}, recruit_sal = #{recruit_sal}, recruit_position = #{recruit_position} recruit_content = #{recruit_content} WHERE recruit_no = #{recruit_no}
